ygData.subject: Re: how to start
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I m a new smith too but i know how to start. At first spend at least 10 points in it, then sharpen til about 20 or so, then make scalers, then skewers for
ygData.messageBody:
Well I'm a new smith too but i know how to start. At first spend at least 10
points in it, then sharpen til about 20 or so, then make scalers, then
skewers for a while til skill is around 100, then you can make simple banded
stuff and some harder ones. You can make them earlier but your success rate
will be low so wait, then when banded stuff is trivial try harder stuff,
70pp should be good to start, I wish i had that much, I only got around 25,
30pp.


Level 13 Barbarian Warrior,
Bristlebane server
